snippet: Google, one of the biggest advertising companies in the world, has finally embraced advertising for itself, reports Claire Cain Miller in Monday's New York Times.
abstract: Google, one of the biggest advertising companies in the world, has finally embraced advertising for itself, reports Claire Cain Miller in Monday's New York Times.
lead_paragraph: Google, one of the biggest advertising companies in the world, has finally embraced advertising for itself, report Claire Cain Miller in Monday's New York Times. Read the entire article.

headline.main: Google Hones Its Advertising Message, Playing to Emotions
